answer: Cyber Naskar served as a Senior Backend Engineer at FarmSetu Technologies Pvt. Ltd., where he led a team of three. He organized a 30-day technical workshop for interns focused on backend engineering, enhancing their skills and knowledge. During his tenure, he developed several GraphQL and REST-based microservices with complex business logic, optimizing database and API performance, which resulted in response time reductions of up to 40%. His collaborative efforts with product and customer success teams ensured that business needs and deadlines were consistently met.
